name: Zombie vs Titan
description:
Zombie vs Titan

Get ready for the zombies in this endless running adventure full of power-ups, spooky zombies and vampire bats that will try to find and crush your candy corn!. Zombies vs Titan is a free arcade game, use your superpowers to kill the monsters, a coin magnet makes it easy to grab coins.

Are you a zombie smasher? Jump on top of the enemy to smash it, do a jumping combo to get extra points. Kill enough zombies to turn into a Super Titan Robot and dominate the zombie highway. This is an addicting 2D side scroller perfect for when you are waiting on the subway and want to play a fun Halloween runner.
